text: Hello! How are you tonight?
I'm doing very well. How are you?
I am good thank you.  Have you heard of Save the Children?
Yes, I have! Is it a charity that you are interested in?
Children are our future and I believe in charities helping children.
So do I. Do you regularly donate your time or money to Save the Children?
I do donate to Save the children a lot.  Do you make donations?
I haven't yet, but I am thinking about doing so in the future.
Check out  URL   It is a great site and you can also make donations on their website.
Thanks for the information. What are your donations used for?
The donations I make go for what ever childrens funding needed.  Would you care to donate at the end of the task?
Sure. would be happy to donate.
Thats great! Thank you. How much will you be donating?
I think I will donate about 20 dollars.
Your an awesome individual. The world needs more people like  yourself.
Thank  you! You are pretty awesome yourself!
Do you do any volunteering?
Yes. Every now and then I volunteer within my community.
Thats fantastic.  I take in children in need who would otherwise do without.  Right now I have 3 extra kids.
That is amazing! You are really helping our country's children.
